metro.GameScreen.TrainLineView

Class TrainLineView

  • java.lang.Object
    • metro.GameScreen.GameScreen
      • metro.GameScreen.TrainLineView.TrainLineView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TrainInteractionTool

    public class TrainLineView
extends GameScreen
implements TrainInteractionTool
    The TrainLineView is a dialog to manage the train lines in METRO. It allows the user to create, modify and remove lines.
    Author:
    hauke
